about_the_game:
Trapped inside a cursed board game, you and your friends from the Mystery Club must uncover the secrets of Cryptfall and find a way to escape—before it’s too late. Gather resources, craft powerful tools, raid the Crypts and slay the hostile Cryptids while finding your way out!

  • Explore the Procedural Island 

Explore every corner of the procedurally generated island, uncovering hidden secrets at every turn. Adventure awaits as you traverse mysterious landscapes and uncover surprises along the way. And, of course, the minecart goes Brr!

  • Find Hidden Artifacts 

Discover treasure chests hidden across the landscape, each containing valuable rewards. Uncover powerful artifacts that enhance your abilities and increase your odds of survival. Every chest you find brings you one step closer to thriving in this unforgiving world.

  • Gather, Craft, Build 

Gather resources to craft powerful weapons and equipment for your journey. Build sturdy shelters to protect yourself from danger. Whether forging tools or fortifying your defenses, survival depends on your skills.

  • Epic Bossfight

Each boss brings its own unique challenge to the fight. Defeat them, and you’ll be rewarded with some awesome loot. Conquer the toughest foes and gear up for the adventures ahead! It won't be easy though...

  • Growing Threat

On this island time is your ultimate adversary. Each passing day brings new dangers as enemies grow stronger and the stakes climb higher. Adapt, strategize, and fight to survive in a world where the challenge evolves with every moment. How long can you endure when the island itself refuses to let you rest?

  • It's Dangerous to Go Alone

Play with up to four friends to increase your chances of survival—or make things worse... Teamwork can turn the tide in your favor, but chaos is just a misstep away. Gather your crew and dive into the adventure together!
